name: daf-well-known-did-configuration
description: DAF Plugin that generates DID configuration files to be used in the DIF Well Known DID Configuration standard: https://identity.foundation/.well-known/resources/did-configuration/

scripts.clean: rm -rf tmp && rm database.sqlite && rm -rf build && rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.upgrade-daf: yarn add -D daf-cli@beta daf-core@beta daf-identity-manager@beta daf-key-manager@beta
